author: Joe McClenahan
title: About Me
body: I am originally from Bellingham Washington. I attended school at Western Washington University where I received a degree in Geophysics and Mathematics. I went on to study geophysics at the University of Wyoming. For the last three years I have worked as a Geophysicist for an oil services company in Houston, TX. I am currently attending Code Fellows in Seattle, WA to pursue a development career.

author: Joe McClenahan
title: Another Post
body: This is another blog post. I am using this to test what my page and filter look like with more posts
